replies.body: Having lag sense 6.6..... up here in Minnesota Riot keeps blaming Century link for my issue.... this just in Century link came and fixed everything and NOTHING HAS CHANGED.
Have to say I'm disappointed at the lack of a threat to switch to Overwatch.

There seems to be two different topics in this thread, and I'm going to do my best to address both of them:

For players in the Minnesota area, there is currently an issue where certain ISP's are not properly peered with us to get you a straight shot to Chicago.  This not only can cause higher than normal ping, but a more unstable connection as well.  We are working with these ISP's to try to get this resolved, but I have no new information to provide right now :(

For players outside of Minnesota, the root cause seems to be something else altogether.  Lag spikes and rubber-banding seem to point to some sort of unstable connection to the the individual game server.  Since not every single player in the game is experiencing the same issue, the fault doesn't seem to lie on the individual game server itself.  Therefore we have to start looking elsewhere as to why this might be happening.  The best step you can do is to use our [Connection Analyzer Too](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743)l.  It'll give you a health check of your network as well as some steps you can take to help improve it.

Let me know if you have any other questions!
